# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new telephony action with data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(coder aDecoder: NSCoder)
```

## Parameters

- **aDecoder**: An unarchiver object.

## Creating an Action

- **init()**: Initializes a new telephony action.
title: init(coder:)
